Create a professional and modern "Add Billboard" listing form for an OOH advertising admin panel.

Required fields:
- Billboard Name (text, required)
- Slug (auto-generate from Billboard Name, read-only)
- Billboard Type (dropdown: LED, Static, Digital, required)
- Lighting (text or dropdown, required)
- Material (text, required)
- Description (textarea, required)
- City (text, required)
- Area (text, required)
- Full Address (text, required)
- Landmark (text, optional)
- Width (ft) (number, required)
- Height (ft) (number, required)
- Facing Direction (text, required)
- Availability Status (dropdown: Available, Booked, Maintenance, required)
- Price per day (number, required)
- Upload Images (multiple image upload with preview, required)

Functional requirements:
- Clean, modern, professional UI
- Fully responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- Proper form validation with error messages under fields
- Auto-generate slug from billboard name
- Show image preview before upload
- Submit button with loading state
- After successful submit, show success message with submitted data
- Use card-based layout with good spacing
- Use accessible labels and placeholders
- Prevent submission if validation fails

Design style:
- Minimal admin dashboard look
- Soft shadows and rounded corners
- Professional color scheme
- User-friendly spacing and alignment
